Summary: 3 glowing orbs traveling slowly from west to east
divs: sighting detailsit was 8:45 in the evening and i was taking the dog out. as i walked out the door to let the dog out, i always make it a habit to look up at the sky to see what the stars look like for the evening. today was a bonus! as i looked out to the west i saw a red glowing orb moving slowly towards the east. i saw it go overhead above the condo unit i live in. curiosity got the best of me and i walked out and around the building to see if i could continue seeing it. as i tried looking for it, i saw another red\orange orb following the same path the first one went through. as i fumbled for my phone to see if i could record it, i saw a third red\orange orb following the exact path and moving slowly. that is what i was able to capture on the video, the 3rd object. the whole event lasted about 3mins. all of the glowing lights appeared to be above & below the clouds as i could see the clouds affecting the glow. which made it appear randomly pulsating. but i'm not sure if that was the clouds. it definately did not have blinking lights, like a plane normally does. this was different. and relatively big in the sky. it made no noise and it kept a consistent slow speed across the sky. it went directly overhead. the best way to visually describe it is like looking at a slightly out of focus point of light moving across the sky.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Wheeling
